July 30, 1892 D Bamber Bridge Contest
Bamber Bridge Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
bamber-bridge-contest
None
Medusa
Bamber Bridge, Lancashire March contest - 1st Skelmersdale Temperance, 2nd Wingates. Promoted by Bamber Bridge Subscription Band. Prizes: £10 and 11 guinea cornet, 7 guineas and 6 guinea trombone, £5. 9 bands entered, 6 competed.
Feb. 14, 2013, 11:29 a.m. June 3, 2019, 12:26 p.m.
1 Skelmersdale Prize Band William Rimmer
2 Wingates Band William Rimmer
3 Bacup Change T. Hardacre
4 Gossage Soap Works William Rimmer
5 Farington Mills Unknown
6 British Aerospace (Chadderton) Unknown
Withdrawn Leyland Subscription Unknown
